attributes.action: lets stop the snp from splitting the uk even more by threatening to leave the uk
attributes.background: The Scottish people were granted the choice to leave the uk back in 2014 to which they decided to stay this means that even when we voted to leave the EU this was together as part of the U.K. The idea to allow yet another vote to leave the uk will further divide this great country

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the policies of political parties. You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134361
